publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3955 Brian Adam: Post Office Account Cards—That the Parliament supports the National Federation of Sub-Postmasters campaign to have Post Office card accounts retained and condemns the Westminster Government’s attempt to abolish these accounts. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Fergus Ewing*, Shiona Baird*, Jim Mather*, Mr David Davidson*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Chris Ballance*, Tricia Marwick*
S2M-3955 Post Office Account Cards (lodged on 14 February 2006) Stewart Stevenson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-3955 Post Office Account Cards (lodged on 14 February 2006) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S2M-3955 Post Office Account Cards (lodged on 14 February 2006) Alex Neil*, Mike Pringle*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3955 Post Office Account Cards (lodged on 14 February 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-3955 Post Office Account Cards (lodged on 14 February 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3955 Post Office Account Cards (lodged on 14 February 2006) Ms Maureen Watt*
